Hi All;

I need to create a html report for my junit tests. Is there a simp=
le and easy way other than http://ant.apache.org/manual/OptionalTasks/junit=
.html this one.

Or a tool that will generate a report after running all te=
sts. I asked for that because i just want to see a simple report and making=
 such configurations is an over-head for me. Is there a simple or an easy w=
ay you can recommend?

And another question about  your experiences: We are=
 using a Service-Oriented-Architecture. Our Services references a method wi=
thin a class. I think junit can report only the tested units (for our case =
the methods) So is there a way of customizing the report or getting the ser=
vice names from a datasource while creating the reports.

Yours
 
=A9brahim=
